sentence: Doug Doucey has refused to take a stand against Rogers, and the Rogers-endorsed Kari Lake has yet to issue a statement about her colleagueâ€™s conduct.
title: Arizona's Wendy Rogers extremely desperate to be on the wrong side of history

sentence: Republican gubernatorial hopeful Matt Salmon has called on her to resign from the Senate, and even allies like gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake and Arizona Republican Party Chairwoman Kelli Ward, both of whom thrive on controversy, have shied away from publicly defending her.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Kelly Townsend drops Az congressional bid to challenge Wendy Rogers

sentence: Meanwhile, key allies like Kari Lake, the Rogers-endorsed candidate for governor, seem to be standing upwind of the woman.
author: Laurie Roberts
title: Wendy Rogers v. Kelly Townsend? Get ready, Arizona, for a race for the ages
